channel.title: Stupid fircking crowns
channel.description:
I got a new source and now i found a problem that isn't to big but it's annoying
I tried to make myself the owner by making my playerrights 3 but then when i logged on no crown It wouldn't affect nything badly but i want my people to see my crown For now im an admin and i edited the server to where Silver corwn is admin and co-owner and owner are gold or player rights are 2
how would i make it so playerrights= 3 has a gold crown when they speak??
thanks much :D :D :D

item.title: Stupid fircking crowns
item.dc:creator: @drdanielfrankc drdanielfrankc
item.description:
@drdanielfrankc wrote:

I am having the same problem- I know other people can see it but can anyone post a code or something so I can see my crown- It’s really getting anoying

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid fircking crowns

item.description:
@marc_is_hood wrote:

[quote=“i want 2 play moparscape, post:9, topic:165375”]Can you please post the Jbirdscape V1 source… i need it BADLY.[/quote]Don’t be a dumbass. Don’t spam in any post you can find please.

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid fircking crowns
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

[quote=“AD LVL 7, post:7, topic:165375”]well, tbh there never was a playerrights 3, It was just a made-up.
just
-1 (banned)
0 (normal player)
1 (player mod)
2 (admin)

but if you really want to find out, look in your ‘void run()’[/quote]

Yeah, true. But, when it was coded instead of “if playerRights = 2” makes the player have a gold crown it was “if playerRights >= 2”

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid fircking crowns
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

well, tbh there never was a playerrights 3, It was just a made-up.
just
-1 (banned)
0 (normal player)
1 (player mod)
2 (admin)

but if you really want to find out, look in your ‘void run()’

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid fircking crowns
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

AS they all said above. You can be running around shouting, and you won’t see it. But everyone who sees you talking can. So no worries. You’ll just have to set that all back to normal.

Read full topic

but other people can ok? but you’ll still have admin options

I got a new source and now i found a problem that isn’t to big but it’s annoying

I tried to make myself the owner by making my playerrights 3 but then when i logged on no crown
It wouldn’t affect nything badly but i want my people to see my crown
